byline.contributor: Michael D. Shear and Ari Isaacman Astles contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: An independent report that draws on publicly available videos, photographs and satellite images has concluded that Russia is continuing to conduct military operations inside Ukraine.

headline.print_headline: Armed With Open Sources, Analysts Gauge Russia’s Role in Ukraine
headline.main: Armed With Google and YouTube, Analysts Gauge Russia’s Presence in Ukraine

snippet: An independent report that draws on publicly available videos, photographs and satellite images has concluded that Russia is continuing to conduct military operations inside Ukraine.
abstract: Atlantic Council, Washington-based research center, releases independent report based on publicly available digital sources, including videos and photos, confirming Russia is continuing military operations in Ukraine, violating February peace agreement.
